specials.name: Rejuvenation
specials.description: If a Llorona reforms at the site of its death after three days.  If the injustices leading to their demise are resolved the Llorona is put to rest.

specials.name: Woe
specials.description:
A creature touched by a Llorona is imparted some of it's great sadness and woe.  The creature must make a DC 28 Will Save.  If a creature ever becomes stupefied 4 by this attack then they are stunned 3 for one round as they bemoan their sadness.
Critical Failure:  Stupefied 2 for 1 minute.
Failure:  Stupefied 1 for 1 round.
Success:  No effect.

specials.name: Wail
specials.description:
Requirement:  A body of water within 120 ft.  Effect:  A Llorona releases a somber wail.  All creatures within 120 feet which can hear the creature must make a Will Save DC 28.
Critical Failure:  The creature is compelled to enter the nearest body of water and begin drowning.  Once they are within the water they may make an additional save each round to end the effect.  They must critically succeed to do so.
Failure:  The creature is stunned 2 as they become distracted by their sadness.
Success:  No effect
Critical Success:  Any enduring Woe, or Wail effects upon the creature are dismissed.

specials.name: Grasping Hands
specials.description: Despite the Llorona's incorporeal trait it may attempt the grapple and shove (athletics) actions against corporeal targets.  If the creature is grabbed they take double it's normal strike damage (4d8+30 negative damage) and are subject to it's woe ability each round.   The Llorona heals for an amount equal to half the damage caused in this manner.

resistance.value: all damage 10 (except force, ghost touch, or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical)

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious
